DialogueNode.npc_text: “I am no expert, but that looks like an explosive device, Miss Callahan.”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian

DialogueNode.npc_text: “Crap. Looks like Gil meant what he said when he said they were going to blow up the ship. Oh well…”
DialogueNode.speaker: Dusty

DialogueNode.npc_text: “Is there anything you can do about it?”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian

DialogueNode.npc_text: “Yes. I know this type of incendiary bombs. I know them only too well…”
DialogueNode.speaker: Dusty
